field.name: use_hl_metadescription
field.label: Use highlighted metadescription in search results
field.description: Use the highlighted metadesciption in the search results instead of the jreviews fragment when available.

field.name: boost
field.default: title^50.0 body_*^10.0 author^5.0 metakeywords_*^5.0 metadescription_*^5.0 category_*^1.0 tags_h1_*^10.0 tags_h2_h3_*^5.0 tags_h4_h5_h6_*^2.0
field.label: Boosts
field.description: Boost certain fields over others when matching a query to the indexed items. E.g. Make title twice as important as category when matching results; title^100.0 category^50.0.
